tum.dss.thesis.lsframework

Class EllipsoidMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • tum.dss.thesis.lsframework.EllipsoidMethod

  • public class EllipsoidMethod
extends Object
    Basic ellipsoid method basically suitable for all kinds of problems. Only minor adjustments have been done for LS framework.
    Author:
    Florian Stallmann

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CUT_CENTRAL
      Constant for central cut
      static int CUT_DEEP
      Constant for deep cut
      static int CUT_SHALLOW
      Constant for shallow cut

      Constant for feasibility mode
      static int MODE_MAXIMIZE
      Constant for maximize mode

      Constant for minimize mode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EllipsoidMethod(SeparationOracleInterface oracle, int dimension)
      Initialize with oracle and number of dimensions, zero vector will be center.
      EllipsoidMethod(SeparationOracleInterface oracle, Matrix<FloatingPoint> center)
      Initializes method with oracle and column matrix as center.
      EllipsoidMethod(SeparationOracleInterface oracle, Vector<FloatingPoint> center)
      Initializes method with oracle and vector as center.

      Gets epsilon threshold.

      Sets type of cut (central, deep, shallow).
      void setEpsilon(double eps)
      Sets epsilon threshold (default 1e-5).
      void setMaxIterations(int iter)
      Overrides maximum number of iterations (default 500.000).
      void setPrimalDecomposition(PrimalDecompositionInterface decomp)
      Sets primal LP of the decomposition that is called to test feasibility each time a new solution is found.

      Overrides calculated radius (default square root of dimension).

      Set to true if the method should end if primal decomposition is feasible.

      Default: Start algorithm in maximization mode.
      void startAlgorithm(boolean optimize)
      Deprecated. 
      Use startAlgorithm(boolean) with EllipsoidMethod.MODE_MAXIMIZE as parameter instead.
      void startAlgorithm(int mode)
      Run ellipsoid method to find feasible or optimal solution.

        public EllipsoidMethod(SeparationOracleInterface oracle,
                       int dimension)
        Initialize with oracle and number of dimensions, zero vector will be center.
        Parameters:
        oracle - separation oracle.
        dimension - dimension of initial center vector.

    • Method Detail

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double radius)
        Overrides calculated radius (default square root of dimension).
        Parameters:
        radius - initial radius for ball.

      • setMaxIterations

        public void setMaxIterations(int iter)
        Overrides maximum number of iterations (default 500.000).
        Parameters:
        iter - maximum number of iterations.

        Sets type of cut (central, deep, shallow).

        public void setEpsilon(double eps)
        Sets epsilon threshold (default 1e-5).
        Parameters:
        eps - threshold.

      • setPrimalDecomposition

        public void setPrimalDecomposition(PrimalDecompositionInterface decomp)
        Sets primal LP of the decomposition that is called to test feasibility each time a new solution is found.
        Parameters:
        decomp - primal model

      • setStopIfFeasible

        public void setStopIfFeasible(boolean stop_feas)
        Set to true if the method should end if primal decomposition is feasible.
        Parameters:
        stop_feas - true to stop if feasible.

      • startAlgorithm

        public void startAlgorithm()
        Default: Start algorithm in maximization mode.

      • startAlgorithm

        public void startAlgorithm(boolean optimize)
        Deprecated. Use startAlgorithm(boolean) with EllipsoidMethod.MODE_MAXIMIZE as parameter instead.
        Backwards compatibility: Allow boolean for maximization.
        Parameters:
        optimize - set to true for maximization instead of feasibility mode.

      • startAlgorithm

        public void startAlgorithm(int mode)
        Run ellipsoid method to find feasible or optimal solution.
        Parameters:
        mode - whether feasible, minimal or maximal solution should be found.
        See Also:
        MODE_MAXIMIZE, MODE_MINIMIZE, MODE_FEASIBILITY

      • getResult

        public double[] getResult()
        Gets the result as double array.
        Returns:
        best found feasible center.

        public double getObjectiveValue()
        Gets the objective value as double.
        Returns:

      • getFirstFeasibleIteration

        public int getFirstFeasibleIteration()
        Gets the first feasible iteration of primal decomposition model.

        Returns 0 if feasibility was not proved at all.

        Returns:
        iteration of first proven feasibility of decomposition.
